author: Get News
title: Choicese (CHC-SES) aims to provide users with convenient, secure, and innovative financial services. | dailytimesleader.com | Serving West Point & Clay County Since 1867
text:
The international investment platform Choicese (CHC-SES) has announced it would cooperate with a local Fintech Brand to jointly expand their business operations and drive the development of innovative fintech solutions in the Indian market. This partnership brings new opportunities and growth prospects for the fintech industry in India, aiming to provide users with convenient, secure, and innovative financial services.
This collaboration brings several benefits to This Fintech Brand. Firstly, through the partnership with Choicese (CHC-SES), it gains access to broader international market channels and investment resources, which will accelerate its expansion and innovation in the Indian fintech sector. Choicese (CHC-SES), as a globally influential investment platform with extensive expertise, will provide strategic guidance and global connections to the brand, facilitating the promotion of its products and services.
Secondly, this collaboration enables This Fintech Brand to leverage Choicese (CHC-SES)'s expertise and best practices in the fintech industry. Choicese (CHC-SES) has accumulated rich experience in investing in and driving it, which will offer valuable guidance and insights to the brand. The partnership fosters knowledge sharing and technological exchange, leading to the development and implementation of innovative solutions.
Furthermore, this collaboration will further propel the growth of the Indian fintech industry. The combined strength of This Fintech Brand and Choicese (CHC-SES) will bring more convenient, secure, and innovative financial services to Indian users. With the power of fintech, users will benefit from efficient payment and transfer services, intelligent investment tools, and personalized financial planning advice. This will enhance financial inclusion in India and drive sustainable economic growth.
In conclusion, the collaboration brings new opportunities and growth prospects for the Indian fintech industry. This partnership strengthens their capabilities and influence, driving the development of innovative fintech solutions and providing users with convenient, secure, and innovative financial services, ultimately contributing to the prosperity and sustainable development of the Indian economy.
Disclaimer: The information provided in this press release is not a solicitation for investment, or intended as investment advice, financial advice, or trading advice. It is strongly recommended that you practice due diligence (including consultation with a professional financial advisor) before investing in or trading securities and cryptocurrency.

author: Guardian staff reporter
title: Storm Gerrit leaves thousands of homes in Scotland without power | UK weather | The Guardian
text:
Gusts of up to 75mph (120km/h) are expected to batter the coasts of southern England and Wales this weekend as other parts of the UK continue to recover from the ravages of Storm Gerrit.
The Met Office issued a yellow weather warning for high winds in the south-east, south-west, East Anglia and Wales from 11am on Saturday until 3am on Sunday, New Year’s Eve.
Separate yellow warnings were issued for sleet and snow in Scotland and rain in Northern Ireland on Saturday.
New Year’s Eve revellers have been urged to wrap up warm as conditions across many parts of the UK could feel close to freezing as clocks strike midnight.
Parts of the UK are still cleaning up after extreme weather wreaked havoc, including the deaths of three men whose 4x4 was submerged in a river in flood-hit North Yorkshire.
About 1,500 homes in Scotland experienced their second night without power and a lightning strike hit supplies in Wales on Thursday.
Scottish and Southern Electricity Networks (SSEN) said it had restored supply to more than 46,000 properties that lost power due to the storm, with people in the north-east and Shetland worst affected. They said the remaining homes should be reconnected on Friday with welfare vans serving hot food and drink to affected customers.
Its operations director, Andy Smith, said: “This has been a difficult couple of days for the communities affected and I’m grateful to them for their patience and support as our teams work extremely hard to restore power.”
National Grid UK said 36,000 properties were without power in Ceredigion in west Wales on Thursday after lightning struck.
00:01:07
Roofs blown off houses as Storm Gerrit brings high winds and floods to UK – video In Tameside, people were still coming to terms with damage caused by a freak tornado that brought down trees and badly damaged roofs.
About 100 properties were damaged by what police called a “localised tornado” in Stalybridge and the village of Carrbrook.
Hayley McCaffer, 40, who lives in Carrbrook, said some of her neighbours’ houses were an “absolute disaster” with missing roofs and “squished” cars.
Damage will be covered by standard property insurance policies, the Association of British Insurers said.
ScotRail said many lines had reopened but urged passengers to check for the latest information before travelling, a message echoed by LNER, Avanti West Coast and London Northwestern Railway, which suspended or cancelled services due to damage or system faults.
There is likely to be significant disruption for travellers wishing to travel on the London Euston and Watford Junction lines, with services expected to be up and running by the end of the day.
Weir gates opened at Marsh Lock in Henley-on-Thames to cope with rising water levels. Photograph: Geoffrey Swaine/Rex/Shutterstock In Wales, the aftermath of the severe weather will affect rail services until Monday.
Ferry services also experienced cancellations and delays due to the storm, with operator DFDS confirming sailings between Dover and France were delayed due to strong winds in the Channel.
Air travel in and out of the UK was disrupted, with cancellations, but most services have returned to normal.
The Met Office said its Irish counterpart, Met Éireann, could name another storm – Storm Hank – as a “deep area of low pressure” pushes strong winds across the Republic of Ireland on Saturday.
Alex Burkill, a Met Office meteorologist, said it would feel cold at night on New Year’s Eve and urged people to “wrap up quite warm” as there would be “a chilly feel to things as the clock strikes midnight”.
Explore more on these topics UK weather England Scotland news

author: Canario79
title: #58 La humillante tradición de hacer desfilar a mujeres desnudas como castigo en India
text:
[Pilar_F.C.](/user/Pilar_F.C.)a [bbc.com](/go/link/3891620) [#38](c38#c-38) cultura y religion no son lo mismo, por mas que se mezclen.
Por ejemplo, el burka es cultural, no musulman, otra cosa es que donde es tradicional el burka eso se mezcle con religion.
Pasa con muchas costumbres afganas que ahora ellos mismos consideran parte de" su islam" que ya las describe alejandro magno
[#24](c24#c-24) Generalizar con que el hecho de la noticia desmiente lo que dices, como si fuese algo común en toda la India, es demagogia pura y pura.
[#20](c20#c-20) el problema es que os estáis dejando llevar por el sensacionalismo de la BBC. No es tradición en la India castigar a los parientes por actos familiares.
Es como decir que en España también lo es (y fijarse solo en un sector de la población innombrable en Menéame no sé muy bien por qué motivo)
[#20](c20#c-20) Demagógico decir que un país de ignorancia y embrutecimiento, de 287 millones de analfabetos, donde es norma cultural tirar las carroñas al río, a veces quemadas, a veces no, donde es norma cultural cagar en la calle, con más dioses que chinches (predicando desde el canibalismo post-mortem a la ejecución de vidudas), con un índice de homicidios de 2,94/100000 h (España 0,68), de 296 millones de pobres, donde la violación está bien vista por una buena parte de sus ciudadanos, con un sistema de castas arrastrado del medioevo, se puede comparar mínimamente al peor país europeo?
A ver si lo vuestro va a ser el riego...
India, cagadero que no pienso pisar salvo obligación laboral.
[#36](c36#c-36) ¿Qué te fumas? Europa (continente) mide 10.530.751 km², Unión Europea (Comunidad política) mide 4.237.473 km² e India 3.287.263 km²
[#44](c44#c-44) hablaba de población. Ya ya, no van a ser 6 veces exactas, quizá son 4,5 veces o 5,7... Perdona por la inexactitud.
[#47](c47#c-47) De población tampoco. Europa son unos 700 millones de personas e India 1.400 millones. Vamos, que son el doble y gracias.
[#49](c49#c-49) ah bueno, si son 1400 millones solo, entonces deben ser todos iguales.
Igual que un sami y un gaditano, que son los 2 europeos.
[#49](c49#c-49) en mi cabeza, pensando en la UE (unos 450 millones) aunque yo pensaba que éramos unos 300. Y estaba pensando en India como 1800 millones, no sé por qué.
Pero no cambia el hecho de que generalizar sobre 1400 personas está un poco feo.
Estos son los que próximamente van a ser una de las mayores potencias mundiales.... Un pais con castas y leyes medievales....
[#6](c6#c-6) No lo van a ser precisamente por ello. Tendrán muchos millones de potenciales productores/consumidores pero siendo así como funcionan no dejarán de ser eso, potenciales.
Eso por no hablar de la industrialización / robotización. Lo que en el pasado ha sucedido con China será harto improbable que vuelva a suceder.
Te recomiendo ver este vídeo:
[#8](c8#c-8) Pues como EEUU que tienes las mejores universidades del mundo y miles de personas asaltando el parlamento vestidos de anormales o miles de personas zombies por fentanilo por las calles.
Relacionada (de otro país, Israel, y se lo hacen a los hombres palestinos):
Soldados de las FDI obligan a niños, hombres y ancianos a desnudarse ante las cámaras a punta de pistola (EN):
Soldados de las FDI obligan a niños, hombres y ancianos a desnudarse ante las cámaras a punta de pistola (EN)
crímenes tan atroces
Tampoco es para decir que esté bien, pero si dejáramos de exagerar tanto sería más fácil comunicarse.
[#31](c31#c-31) "La sacaron a rastras, la desnudaron y la hicieron desfilar así por el pueblo. Después, la ataron a un poste de electricidad y la golpearon durante horas."
No te quedes en el paseo desnuda, la ataron a un poste y la golpearon durante horas... Yo lo veo bastante atroz, la verdad.
[#15](c15#c-15) Echando memoria de noticias, pero si quieres material gráfico pásate por goredb.com o alguna del estilo y busca children india burn alive, no localizo el video, pero vi como quemaban viva a una niña, en la descripción ponía que era para provocar lluvias. Era espeluznante, 7 minutos tardó en morir...., pero buen material para enseñar a aquellos que dicen que los inmigrantes se deben quedar en su país, puede concienciar a más de uno que si la gente se va de sus países es por una buena razón.
India es un país con multitud de sub países, tradiciones y formas de ver la vida. No tiene nada que ver Bangalore o Hyderabad, que nos podrían recordar a cualquier zona desarrollada de Europa, con un pueblo en medio de Rajastan en los que aún no tienen agua corriente ni redes de saneamiento. Las castas legalmente ya no existen y en muchos estados ni siquiera forman parte de la cultura ni costumbres de la población.
Por lo tanto, juzgar a todo un país y a su gente por lo que hace un pequeño porcentaje me parece bastante injusto. En Europa somos 400MM, en India tienen casi 4x nuestra población.
[#27](c27#c-27) Las castas existen, lo he visto con mis ojos viajando de mochilero durmiendo en guesthouses y moviéndome por zonas donde no hay turismo. No niego que haya zonas más desarrolladas, pero la gran mayoría de la zona norte, incluyendo la capital, es lamentable. Y es precisamente la zona norte donde mayor población hay.
Qué tan equiparable es defender este hecho bajo el paraguas de 'tradición y cultura', con defender la tauromaquia con los mismos argumentos?
Bueno, es el precio de mantener los "valores tradicionales" y no pasarse al "buenismo", algunos en occidente no paran de dar la brasa con volver a los métodos de antes porque supuestamente son más "efectivos". Claro que también dan la brasa con el NWO, los masones, que si el COVID es una mentira y demás, así que mucho caso no deberíamos hacerles.

author: Valeria Ordóñez Ghio
title: Ucrania asegura que hundió un buque de guerra ruso frente a la costa de Crimea
text: [Ucrania](https://cnnespanol.cnn.com/category/ucrania/) Ucrania asegura que hundió un buque de guerra ruso frente a la costa de Crimea y desató un bombardeo "masivo" de misiles en la península (CNN) --La inteligencia militar de Ucrania asegura que hundió un buque de guerra ruso frente a la costa de Crimea durante la madrugada de este jueves, en lo que fue el golpe más reciente de varios contra la flota de Rusia en el mar Negro después de llevar a cabo un ataque “masivo” con misiles en la península ocupada horas antes. El Ivanovets, un barco ruso con misiles guiados, sufrió múltiples impactos en su casco antes de hundirse durante la madrugada en el puerto del lago Donuzlav, el lago más profundo de Crimea, informó la Inteligencia de Defensa de Ucrania. Imágenes nocturnas que proporcionó Ucrania mostraron drones navales acercándose a alta velocidad hacia el barco ruso antes de explotar con el impacto, causando daños importantes al barco. Al final del video, el barco parece haberse hundido, con solo la proa sobre el agua. CNN no pudo verificar de forma independiente las afirmaciones de Ucrania y en las imágenes no queda claro qué barco fue impactado ni cuándo. El Ministerio de Defensa de Rusia, el Kremlin y otros funcionarios rusos aún no han comentado sobre el incidente. El hundimiento del Ivanovets es el último de una serie de ataques ucranianos contra la flota rusa del mar Negro, en un intento por asestar golpes tanto estratégicos como simbólicos contra las fuerzas rusas que anexaron Crimea en 2014. Ucrania ha dicho anteriormente que sus ataques a Crimea y a barcos rusos tienen como objetivo tratar de aislar la península y hacer más difícil para Rusia sostener sus operaciones militares en el territorio continental de Ucrania, donde las líneas del frente han permanecido prácticamente estáticas durante meses. El más notable de sus ataques fue contra el Moskva en abril de 2022, el cual obligó a Rusia a cambiar su forma de operar cerca de las zonas controladas por Ucrania. El barco se hizo famoso después de amenazar con bombardear la isla Snake en el mar Negro si los soldados ucranianos que lo defendían no se rendían. “Buque de guerra ruso, vete a la mie***”, respondió uno de los soldados. El ataque al Ivanovets ocurre horas después de que Ucrania lanzara el miércoles una andanada de misiles contra Crimea, en lo que el comandante de la Fuerza Aérea de ese país describió como parte de “la limpieza de Crimea de la presencia rusa”. Ucrania lanzó 20 misiles guiados desde el aire contra Crimea, y las defensas aéreas rusas destruyeron 17 de ellos sobre el mar Negro y tres más sobre la península, de acuerdo con el Ministerio de Defensa de Rusia. Dijo que algunos de los misiles fueron interceptados cerca del aeródromo de Belbek, cerca de la ciudad de Sebastopol. “Nuestro Ejército repelió un ataque masivo contra Sebastopol”, dijo el miércoles el gobernador de la ciudad designado por Rusia, Mikhail Razvozhaev. Y agregó que más de seis misiles fueron derribados. [Ucrania dice que descubrió un plan de corrupción de US$ 40 millones en compra de armas por parte de su ejército](https://cnnespanol.cnn.com/2024/01/28/ucrania-corrupcion-us-40-millones-armas-ejercito-trax/) Razvozhaev dijo que alrededor de una docena de edificios fueron impactados por la caída de escombros, lo que causó ventanas rotas y otros daños, pero no se reportaron heridos. El aeródromo de Belbek fue anteriormente la base de la 204.ª Brigada de Aviación Táctica de Ucrania, dijo el miércoles Mykola Oleshchuk, comandante de la Fuerza Aérea de Ucrania, en una publicación de Telegram, acompañada de un video de una explosión. “Los aviadores ucranianos definitivamente regresarán a su aeródromo de origen. Mientras tanto, agradezco a todos los que contribuyeron a la limpieza de Crimea de la presencia rusa”, dijo Oleshchuk. Yurii Ihnat, portavoz del Comando de la Fuerza Aérea, hizo eco el jueves de esos comentarios y dijo que "ciertas instalaciones en la península fueron impactadas". CNN no puede verificar de forma independiente las afirmaciones de ninguna de las partes. Los ataques se producen mientras aumentan las especulaciones sobre el posible despido del comandante en jefe de las Fuerzas Armadas de Ucrania, el general Valerii Zaluzhnyi, tras semanas de crecientes especulaciones sobre las tensiones con el presidente Volodymyr Zelensky.

author: Mia Brunton
title: Why Shopping for Items Online Is Higher Than In-Store
text:
Shopping for items ought to be a joyful experience, but it often becomes irritating, particularly throughout holidays or special occasions. With the rise of e-commerce, more individuals are turning to on-line shopping—and for good reason. On-line present shopping provides a wide range of advantages that make it far superior to the traditional in-store experience.
1. Unmatched Comfort
One of the biggest advantages of shopping for presents online is convenience. You’ll be able to shop 24/7 without worrying about store hours, traffic, or long checkout lines. Whether or not you are at home, at work, or on the go, a number of clicks on your smartphone or computer can have the perfect present on its way. This is very useful for final-minute shoppers or these with tight schedules.
2. Endless Selection and Options
Physical stores have limited shelf space, which means their present selection may be quite restricted. Online stores, nonetheless, can showcase thousands of products throughout a number of categories. From personalized items to international brands, the internet provides access to a a lot broader range of options. You’re far more likely to find something unique and fitting for the recipient when shopping online.
3. Easy Worth Comparisons
Shopping online makes it easy to check costs across completely different retailers. Instead of walking from store to store or counting on in-store promotions, you should utilize price comparability websites, browser extensions, or just open a number of tabs to find one of the best deal. Many online platforms also offer coupons and discount codes, serving to you save even more.
4. Time-Saving and Efficient
Driving to stores, looking for parking, and browsing crowded aisles takes time. Online shopping eliminates these time-wasters. You’ll be able to search, filter, and kind products by price, popularity, or scores within seconds. When you know what you’re looking for, putting an order takes just a couple of minutes. The efficiency of online shopping can turn a multi-hour task into a short and simple one.
5. Product Reviews for Higher Decisions
Another benefit of shopping online is access to customer reviews. When shopping for a gift, it’s helpful to know whether or not others have been glad with the product. On-line evaluations provide valuable insights into quality, durability, and total buyer satisfaction. This information is never available in physical stores and can be the difference between shopping for a terrific present or a disappointing one.
6. Problem-Free Delivery and Gifting Options
Most e-commerce sites offer fast and reliable delivery, with many providing gift-wrapping services and the option to include a personalized note. Some even permit you to ship the present directly to the recipient, saving you the additional step of mailing it yourself. This is particularly useful if the individual you’re gifting lives in one other city or country.
7. Less Pressure, More Considerate Decisions
In-store shopping may be rushed and overwhelming, especially during peak seasons. Salespeople may pressure you to make a purchase or push products that aren’t suitable. On-line shopping gives you the space and time to think. You’ll be able to bookmark items, read opinions, and return later without being rushed, allowing for more considerate and significant gift choices.
8. Avoiding Crowds and Stress
Busy malls and stores could be chaotic, particularly during holidays. For many individuals, the crowds, noise, and pressure to determine quickly can be overwhelming. Shopping online enables you to keep away from this entirely. You may browse in peace, take breaks, and avoid the physical and mental fatigue that comes with in-individual shopping.
9. Access to Exclusive Online Offers
Many retailers supply online-only deals, flash sales, and loyalty rewards that aren’t available in-store. Signing up for newsletters or using on-line platforms like cashback sites can unlock additional savings. These exclusive perks make on-line shopping even more interesting for reward buyers looking to get probably the most value.
The benefits of shopping for gifts on-line proceed to grow as e-commerce platforms evolve. From unmatched comfort and selection to emphasize-free experiences and higher costs, shopping for items online clearly outshines the traditional in-store approach.

author: @CSIMarket
title: Revolutionary Alzheimer's Treatment Creates Hope as NKGen Biotech Announces Promising Results
text: Revolutionary Alzheimer's Treatment Creates Hope as NKGen Biotech Announces Promising Results Published / Modified Dec 28 2023 CSIMarket Team / CSIMarket.com NKGen Biotech,Inc. Announces Promising Results in its Groundbreaking Alzheimer's Treatment Trial In a groundbreaking development, NKGen Biotech, a leading biotechnology company, has recently initiated the first patient dosing for its Phase 1/2a clinical trial utilizing their autologous natural killer (NK) cell product, known as SNK01. This innovative treatment aims to address the urgent need for effective therapies for patients suffering from moderate Alzheimer's Disease (AD), a debilitating neurodegenerative condition affecting millions worldwide. Recent findings from NKGen Biotech's Phase 1 dose-escalation safety trial have demonstrated promising results, showcasing the potential of SNK01 to improve neuroinflammation and cognitive function among AD patients. The trial involved carefully selecting and administering autologous NK cells to patients, with the aim of harnessing the innate immune system's ability to combat the underlying pathology of Alzheimer's Disease. Neuroinflammation, characterized by chronic inflammation in the brain, is increasingly recognized as a major contributor to the progression of Alzheimer's Disease. By effectively targeting and reducing neuroinflammation,NKGen's SNK01 product candidate offers a novel approach to combating the disease and potentially slowing its progression. The Phase 1 safety trial showed encouraging improvements in both neuroinflammation levels and cognitive function among the participants, signifying a significant step forward in Alzheimer's research. NKGen Biotech's dedication to advancing Alzheimer's therapeutics is driven by their mission to improve patient outcomes and enhance the quality of life for those affected by this devastating disease. With the initiation of their Phase 1/2a trial, the company is taking steadfast strides towards developing a viable treatment option that could potentially transform the lives of millions of individuals worldwide. The groundbreaking potential of SNK01 lies in its utilization of the patient's own NK cells, which are carefully modified and expanded before being reintroduced into the body. This autologous approach eliminates the risk of rejection, making it a safe and promising treatment alternative. By harnessing the strength of NK cells, which possess extraordinary capabilities in identifying and eliminating abnormal cells, NKGen Biotech aims to redefine the landscape of Alzheimer's treatment. Dr. John Collins, Chief Medical Officer at NKGen Biotech, expressed his enthusiasm for the success displayed in the Phase 1 trial, stating, These compelling results provide a solid foundation for moving forward with our Phase 2a trial, and we are eager to delve deeper into the potential therapeutic benefits that SNK01 may offer to Alzheimer's patients. Looking ahead, NKGen Biotech is committed to further advancing their novel therapy through subsequent clinical trials. Their Phase 2a trial is set to evaluate the efficacy and safety profile of SNK01 in a larger pool of AD patients, aiming to replicate and build upon the positive outcomes observed in the Phase 1 safety trial. In conclusion, the commencement of patient dosing for the Phase 1/2a trial with SNK01 marks a significant milestone in NKGen Biotech's pursuit of an effective treatment for Alzheimer's Disease. With encouraging results from the Phase 1 trial, the company is well-positioned to continue blazing a trail in Alzheimer's research, contributing to the collective effort towards improving the lives of those affected by this devastating disease. author: Petar Jovanović
title: XRP and Cardano Show Growth, But This Altcoin Is Losing Holders
text:
Santiment just posted an interesting report on X about wallet holders situation for top cryptos: Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, DOGE, ADA, and LINK. The data reveals that most top digital assets are experiencing growth in their holder base, with Ethereum leading the pack in absolute numbers.
The report shows Ethereum has added an impressive 645,000 new wallets to its network, representing a 0.5% increase since the start of 2025. Bitcoin follows with 102,000 new wallets, while [XRP has grown ](https://captainaltcoin.com/is-xrp-price-set-for-a-500-rally-crypto-expert-breaks-it-down/)its holder base by 58,000 wallets, marking a 1.0% increase.
Dogecoin continues to maintain its community growth with 29,000 new wallets, while [Cardano shows modest but steady progress](https://captainaltcoin.com/cardano-whales-massively-selling-ada-price-crash-incoming/) with 2,800 new holders, translating to a 0.1% increase. However, not all major cryptocurrencies are seeing positive numbers. Chainlink stands out as an exception, experiencing a decline of 3,300 wallets, equivalent to a 0.5% decrease in its holder base.
These wallet trends often reflect investor sentiment and long-term confidence in these projects. The growth in wallet numbers for most major cryptocurrencies suggests sustained interest from market participants, while Chainlink’s decrease might indicate temporary uncertainty among its holders. However, Santiment notes “there may be some excess FUD that indicates an opportunity to buy (as a contrarian to the panicking crowd).”
The contrast between Ethereum’s substantial wallet growth and Cardano’s smaller increase provides interesting insights into the current state of various blockchain networks. While percentage changes help understand relative growth, the absolute numbers reveal the true scale of adoption across different platforms.
For contrarian investors, Chainlink’s current situation might be particularly interesting. While some holders are reducing their positions, historically, such periods of decreased holder confidence have sometimes presented opportunities for those who take a counter-position to market sentiment. However, as with any market movement, these trends should be considered alongside other fundamental and technical factors.

title: Rigetti Computing Enters Strategic Collaboration with Quanta Computer to Advance Superconducting Quantum Computing
text:
Rigetti and Quanta Computer announced a partnership to advance superconducting quantum computing, committing over $200 million in investments.

Full Release
BERKELEY, Calif., Feb. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rigetti Computing, Inc. (Nasdaq: RGTI) (“Rigetti” or the “Company”), a pioneer in full-stack quantum-classical computing, today announced that it has entered into a strategic collaboration agreement with Quanta Computer Inc., (“Quanta”, TWSE: 2382.TW) a Taiwan-based Global Fortune 500 company and the global leader of computer server manufacturing, to accelerate the development and commercialization of superconducting quantum computing.
The companies have committed to investing more than $100 million each over the next five years, with both sides focusing on their complementary strengths to develop superconducting quantum computing technologies. In addition, Quanta will invest $35 million and purchase shares of Rigetti, subject to regulatory clearance.
The quantum computing industry is poised to experience rapid growth in the next 5 years, with increasing commercial interest and the market expected to reach $1-2 billion/year by 2030 1 . Of the quantum computing modalities, superconducting qubits are proven to have many advantages over ion trap and neutral atoms, including fast gate speeds and well-established manufacturing techniques from the semiconductor industry.
“Quanta’s investment in Rigetti will strengthen our leadership in this flourishing market. Our companies’ complementary strengths -- Rigetti as a pioneer in superconducting quantum technology, with open, modular architecture enabling incorporation of innovative solutions across different parts of the stack easily, and Quanta as the world’s leading notebook/server manufacturer with $43 billion in annual sales -- will help to put us at the forefront of the quantum computing industry,” says Dr. Subodh Kulkarni, Rigetti CEO.
1 “Quantum Computing On Track to Create Up to $850 Billion of Economic Value By 2040,” BCG, July 18, 2024
About Rigetti
Rigetti is a pioneer in full-stack quantum computing. The Company has operated quantum computers over the cloud since 2017 and serves global enterprise, government, and research clients through its Rigetti Quantum Cloud Services platform. In 2021, Rigetti began selling on-premises quantum computing systems with qubit counts between 24 and 84 qubits, supporting national laboratories and quantum computing centers. Rigetti’s 9-qubit Novera QPU was introduced in 2023 supporting a broader R&D community with a high-performance, on-premises QPU designed to plug into a customer’s existing cryogenic and control systems. The Company’s proprietary quantum-classical infrastructure provides high-performance integration with public and private clouds for practical quantum computing. Rigetti has developed the industry’s first multi-chip quantum processor for scalable quantum computing systems. The Company designs and manufactures its chips in-house at Fab-1, the industry’s first dedicated and integrated quantum device manufacturing facility. Learn more at
https://www.rigetti.com/
.
About Quanta Computer
Quanta Computer Inc. is a Fortune Global 500 Company and a leader in worldwide notebook manufacturing, as well as a leading solution provider in cloud computing. Quanta provides innovative products with superior technology in information and communications, consumer electronics, cloud computing, smart home solutions, smart automobile solutions, smart healthcare, and AIoT, etc. Founded in 1988 and listed in TWSE since 1999, Quanta Computer is headquartered in Taiwan with manufacturing and service locations across Asia, Americas, and Europe, etc. FY2024 consolidated revenues for Quanta Computer amounted to US$43 billion with a workforce of approximately 60,000 employees worldwide. For further information, please visit Quanta Computer’s website at
www.quantatw.com
.
